MEMORANDUM
October 21, 1957
10 : Board of Directors, National Association of Educational Broadcasters
FROM : Irving Rc Merrill, for th9 Research Committee
SUBJECT : Purchase of the Nielsen Coverage Study "by the Association„
1* At the August meeting of the Research Committee, it was unanimously
agreed that the Association he urged to purchase "NCS 42,n a nation-wide radio
and television coverage study conducted in the spring, 1956®
2® One provision was attached: the price must he right, Merrill was
delegated to follow through, in cooperation with Paulu and Skornia, on negotia¬
tions already iniated. On October 2, Skornia and Merrill met with Mr, John K,
Churchill of the Nielsen Company in Chicago, We were convinced that the Company
had made a final offer,
3, Following this meeting I have carefully examined the situation again,
and on behalf of the Research Committee submit the following recommendations:
a. Purchase of Complete Circulation Reports, "CCR”, consisting
of data for both television and radio showing, by State,
further broken down by counties (listed alphabetically) for
all stations having reportable coverage in each of these
areas, Price $1,155»
b. Purchase of an additional copy of same data, bound separately
for each State, separate volumes for television and radio.
Price $ 60,
Total $1,215.
4, What do we get for $1,215?
1 Bound volume giving coverage data county by county
for the entire nation for radio
1 Bound volume giving coverage data county by county
for the entire nation for television
46 State folios, giving coverage data county by county
for the State for radio
48 State folios, giving coverage data county by county
for the State for television
5, Row would this be used?
a. Keep the bound volumes as a permanent reference at NAEB head¬
quarters „
b. Ship out, at individual member station request, the appropriate
State folio, letting the member photostat, etc, pertinent pages,
(Pm positive this is o,k, with Nielsen, Harry!)
